column4: I'm not looking for a derivitive, I'm simply asking, if the only functioning laptop I have only has a half gig of RAM, will my Ubuntu have even half of prayer of booting so I can more easily salvage files off of it?
my main laptop died, this is just a spare that I happened to have, it's only got 512 MB of RAM.....
the problem is not booting or the OS .... the problem will be running apps. Browsers these days consume memory like it's free air
why not turn the machine in to a thin client
